scripts.clean: lerna clean && yarn workspaces run clean
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development yarn workspace app run dev
scripts.dll: cross-env NODE_ENV=production yarn workspace @my/tools run build-dll
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production yarn workspace app run build
scripts.deploy: cross-env NODE_ENV=production yarn workspace app run prd
scripts.apm: cross-env NODE_ENV=production yarn workspace @my/apm run build
